The person responsible for data processi: The person responsible for data processing on this website is
The responsible body decides alone or jo: The responsible body decides alone or jointly with others on the purposes and means of processing personal data (e.g. names, contact details, etc.).
Revocation of your consent to data proce: Revocation of your consent to data processing
Only with your express consent are some: Only with your express consent are some data processing operations possible. Revocation of your already given consent is possible at any time. An informal notification by e-mail is sufficient for the revocation. The lawfulness of the data processing carried out up to the revocation remains unaffected by the revocation.
Right to appeal to the competent supervi: Right to appeal to the competent supervisory authority
As the person concerned, you have the ri: As the person concerned, you have the right to complain to the responsible supervisory authority in the event of a violation of data protection laws. The competent supervisory authority about data protection issues is the data protection commissioner of the federal state in which our company is located.
You have the right to have data, which w: You have the right to have data, which we process automatically based on your consent or in fulfillment of a contract, handed over to you or third parties. The data will be provided in a machine-readable format. If you request the direct transfer of the data to another responsible party, this will only be done as far as it is technically feasible.
Right to information, correction, blocki: Right to information, correction, blocking, deletion
Within the framework of the applicable l: Within the framework of the applicable legal provisions, you have the right to obtain information free of charge at any time about your stored personal data, the origin of the data, its recipients and the purpose of the data processing and, if applicable, a right to correct, block or delete this data. In this regard and also for further questions on the subject of personal data, you can contact us at any time using the contact options listed in the imprint.
For security reasons and to protect the: For security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content that you send to us as the site operator, our website uses SSL or TLS encryption. This means that data that you transmit via this website cannot be read by third parties. You can recognize an encrypted connection by the „HTTPS:// “address line of your browser and the lock symbol in the browser line.
Our website uses cookies. These are smal: Our website uses cookies. These are small text files that your web browser stores on your end device. Cookies help us to make our website more user-friendly, effective, and safe. Some cookies are „session cookies. Such cookies are automatically deleted after your browser session ends. On the other hand, other cookies remain on your terminal device until you delete them yourself. Such cookies help us to recognize you when you return to our website. With a modern web browser, you can monitor, restrict or prevent the setting of cookies. Many web browsers can be configured so that cookies are automatically deleted when you close the program. Disabling cookies may result in the limited functionality of our website. The setting of cookies, which are necessary for electronic communication processes or the provision of certain functions desired by you (e.g. shopping cart), is based on Art. 6 Par. 1 lit. f DSGVO. As operators of this website, we have a legitimate interest in the storage of cookies for the technically error-free and smooth provision of our services. If other cookies are set (e.g. for analysis functions), these will be treated separately in this data protection declaration.
We don't take any responsibility for the: We don't take any responsibility for the content of external links. The content of linked pages is within the liability of their respective operator.
This website serves as a communication c: This website serves as a communication channel for workers producing for the above companies and their stakeholders. You have the opportunity of complaints about violation of the Code of Conduct to inform.
Please complete the respective fields in: Please complete the respective fields in the form provided for this purpose. These include the following information: description of the situation, name and address of the workplace. In general, all data are made anonymous. However, if specific complaints about violations of a code of conduct in a specific workplace are put forward, make sure that the name and address of the workplace are reported, as otherwise we have no chance to verify the given information.
When you complete the form fields, click: When you complete the form fields, click on 'Send'. After you click 'Send', you will get a so-called ticket number and a personal password. You can use this ticket number and the password to communicate with us in future. Therefore, you are strongly advised to write down your personal ticket number and your password and shall be retained, that you can find them again.
When you have sent us your message, you: When you have sent us your message, you have to wait 3 working days. After 3 working days, you can get a first response on this website. Click on 'Our message to you'. Then you will be asked for your personal ticket number and your personal password. After you entered both you can read our message to you. This message can also contain general explanations, explanation of further procedure, or even questions, of which answers are important for us for further processing.
But also feel free to make the company s: But also feel free to make the company suggestions or tell them also what you think is good.
